nodes.text: Dantooine Base was a presumably Imperial-owned outpost on the planet of Dantooine. Anyone who held the Intergalactic Passport and were to travel through certain areas of the known galaxy that were directly controlled by the Galactic Emperor were required to register their location to the base's commander before departure, as well as maintain regular contact with this base throughout the voyage using established communication codes, as not even the Imperial Senate could guarantee clearance through these areas.
